creditline: Gift of the artist, courtesy of Gallery Riis, Oslo
description: off-white sheet with single line-drawn image in bottom center; long, thin looped shape with curving parallel line attached, forming a simple, abstract hill, rendered in black crayon; lines are simple and thin, with top looping shape darkened with thicker black lines in center
inscription: LRC, in pencil: til Mine fra Jan | on back, LLC in pencil: JGt 1321
title: Untitled
